scripts.build:debug:
echo Building WEB (debug) && mkdir -p dist && echo '

Debug Web

' > dist/index.html
scripts.build:test:
echo Building WEB (test) && mkdir -p dist && echo '

Test Web

' > dist/index.html
scripts.build:release:
echo Building WEB (release) && mkdir -p dist && echo '

Release Web

' > dist/index.html
scripts.build:release-protected:
echo Building WEB (release-protected) && mkdir -p dist && echo '

Release-Protected Web

' > dist/index.html
